abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Adversaries could not attack Warpriest if they are adjacent to the Gryph-hound

abilities.name: Sigmar's Miracle
abilities.description: When Gryph-hound is slain, it is leaved in the space it was slain. It cannot be attacked nor act until healed.

table.name: Kill Command
table.description: The Gryph Hound moves towards the enemy they can reach, and then attacks them with the Maw & Claws if in range.

table.name: Heel Command
table.description: The Gryph Hound moves towards the enemy which is nearest to the Excelsior Warpriest, and then attacks them with the Maw & Claws if in range.

table.name: Down Command
table.description: The Gryph Hound heals D3 wounds.
